answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!The symptoms could be the side effect of her medications. She should talk to her doctor and either change the timing of medication or change the medication.Other possibility is menopause. She should get her blood levels of FSH, LH, estrogen and progesterone checked with help of a gynecologist.Other possibility is paresthesia or abnormal sensations involved with peripheral neuropathies of diabetes, hypothyroidism, Lyme's and lupus. Please consult her PCP for primary examination followed by proper referral.Take care!
